players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I think Alice is suspicious. She may be the mafia."
Charlie: "Bob, you were the only one to speak. That makes me suspicious. Alice hasn't said much yet, so I'd vote for Bob."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and found him to be mafia. We should vote him out."
Bob: ". So final: "
You: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him and he killed Diana. Vote him out."
Charlie: "Alice, you’re right. Bob is mafia. Let’s vote him out."

Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
